name: JellyFlix
author: prayagprajapati17
description: A theme that aims to replicate the red and black look of Netflix. Theme is by prayag17.

name: Monochromic
author: EdgeMentality
description: This theme aims to be minimalistic and somewhat muted in color. Add-ons and custom accent colors are possible, but not entirely supported by this plug-in. Visit the github of the theme for more information.

options.name: Improve performance
options.description: The theme uses mask-image to fade out items below the top bar as you scroll. This works well on most reasonable hardware but struggles on some phones and especially smart TVs. This switches to a method without using mask-image, but foregoes the fade-out effect. I may switch to this method being the default.

options.name: No rounded corners
options.description: In fact, squares off every rounded corner JF ever had.

options.name: Restore bottom bar style episode progress
options.description: Don't like my transparent view progress overlay? Use this to go back to the old style.

options.name: Modify rounding
options.description: Amount of rounding. Zero is none.

options.name: Accent color
options.description: Choose a custom accent color to use with the theme.

name: Custom
author: you
description: customize the look of jellyfin by your needs

options.name: Change Font
options.description: Change the default fonts

options.name: Title Font Size
options.description: Change the size of the font used at titles.

options.name: Modify rounding
options.description: Amount of rounding. Zero is none.

options.name: Accent color
options.description: Choose a custom accent color to use with the theme.
options.css: .countIndicator {background: rgba($,0.8);}.playedIndicator, .innerCardFooter /*Accenting*/.button-flat:hover {background: rgba($,0.25);}.paper-icon-button-light:hover {  background-color: rgba($,0.25) !important;}.subtitleappearance-preview {  background: linear-gradient(140deg,rgba($),#111) !important;}.navMenuOption-selected, .selectionCommandsPanel {    background: rgba($, 0.8) !important;}.raised,.fab,a[data-role='button'] {  background: rgba($, 0.8) !important;	transition: all 0.2s !important;}/*Glow accent*/.raised.homeLibraryButton {    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgba($, 0) !important;    border: solid 1px rgba($,0) !important;}.cardOverlayContainer:hover,.dialog,..raised.homeLibraryButton:hover {  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgb($) !important;  border: solid 1px rgba($,0.6) !important;}.cardOverlayContainer {  border: solid 1px rgba($,0.0) !important;}

options.name: Console Panel Color
options.description: Modifies the color of the left menu panel.

options.name: Image Edge Rounded
options.description: Modifies the color of the left menu panel.

options.name: Enlarge Tab Buttons
options.description: Enlarges the tab buttons, suggested, genres, etc. By default they are really tiny, especially on mobile.

options.name: Stylized Episode Previews
options.description: The episode previews in season view are sized based on horizontal resolution. This leads to a lot of wasted space on the episode summary and a high vertical page, which requires a lot of scrolling. This code reduces the height of episode entries, which solves both problems.
options.css: /* Size episode preview images in a more compact way */.listItemImage.listItemImage-large.itemAction.lazy {height: 110px;}.listItem-content {height: 115px;}.secondary.listItem-overview.listItemBodyText {height: 61px; margin: 0;}

options.name: Custom Background Color
options.description: Change background color.

options.name: Right Header Color
options.description: This modifies the colors of the cast, search and user buttons in the top right.

options.name: Border Radius
options.description: Change the roundness of text box and more default is zero

options.name: Backdrop Blur
options.description: adds blur to the backdrop images default is zero
